reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's style, particularly its heart-shaped buttons, and appreciate its quality, with one noting it remains wonderful even after washing. The fabric is soft and cozy, and customers find it comfortable and well-fitting. They like the color, with one mentioning the gold detail as a perfect touch. However, several customers find it oversized.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size
items.body: This sweater is warm, cozy and stylish. It is stretchy, nice waist length, pretty good quality. I do not recommend sizing up, I'm a medium but ordered a large, it's too big. I ordered the black and navy blue, must return both for a smaller size. I do recommend this sweater. Cute heart shape buttons. Read more
items.author: Rock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, love, love!
items.body: This cardigan is a soft, the quality is exceptional, the style I’m in love with, and let’s not forget the heart detail in the buttons! It does run a tiny bit large, but cardigans are meant to fit loose in my opinion and I am 5 feet 160 pounds short so that might make a difference if someone that’s taller purchases it. Read more
items.author: Kathlem Noriega

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: What a I liked of this cardigan is the buttons, they looks cute. The quality is good. But the color and how it fits just not like Read more
items.author: Flabia tejada

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very classy gold buttons are beautiful
items.body: I love this sweater! It’s so pretty with the gold heart buttons. I like the puffy sleeves. It runs large. I didn’t realize it until the return time had expired. I gave it to my daughter and bought a smaller size. I usually wear a medium or large and a medium is definitely big enough. Read more
items.author: Pamela J. Ford

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great color, not soft though.
items.body: I really wanted to love this but the material was scratchy. I typically love and purchase this brand so was disappointed. The color was very pretty, vibrant and perfect for holidays. The buttons were cute detail although not high quality. The fit was good and true to size. The material was mid weight, cute style. Read more
items.author: Heidi Steinhebel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: The first time I purchased the Small, they sent me a Large. I gifted it to my mom and bought another Small, and thankfully they sent a Small. It runs large on purpose, it is very snuggly and WARM. I am surprised how much cold it keeps out. I do wish it had pockets. I love the buttons! Read more
items.author: Billy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is good. Looks very nice
items.body: Very pretty sweater. The color is as shown and the quality is very good. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Previously owned clearly
items.body: Overall the cardigan is nice and appears to be good quality and warm, thick material. My complaint is that it seems like it was returned/used/worn. It smells like perfume and the tag was ripped off and there were two woman’s hairs on it. I feel like someone worn it (beyond trying it on) and returned it. Read more
items.author: Ally

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Red Brown, Burgundy, Grey Blue, Black, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Navy, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
